isis.stitle: INTERNATIONAL RIDE OPTIMIZED SUSPENSION (IROS) - REMOVE AND INSTALL - Checking 'U'- Bolt Nut Torque and 'U'-Bolt Nut Tightening Procedure

svcproc.title: Checking 'U'- Bolt Nut Torque and 'U'-Bolt Nut Tightening Procedure

step1.para: Inspect the 'U'-bolt threads and 'U'-bolt nuts for rust and debris and clean threads if contaminated.
Using a torque wrench determine the torque required to turn the 'U'-bolt nuts while tightening (clockwise rotation)
Using the lowest nut torque discovered as the reference starting point re-tighten the nuts using the sequence noted in : Installing 'U'- Bolts and 'U'- Bolt Nuts.
